uszatek.title: Teddy Drop Ear
uszatek.description: A plane that's going to fly around, scan and drop things, maybe it won't crash and will be overall great.

organization.description: Student organization dedicated to building innovative solar-powered aircraft.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Subscribe to follow our journey in solar-powered aviation.

items.title: Project Started
items.description: Formation of AGH Solar Plane team and initial concept development of our first solar-powered aircraft.

items.title: First Prototype
items.description: Development and construction of our first prototype, including extensive testing of solar cell configurations.

items.title: Competition Success
items.description: Participation in international competitions and recognition for innovative design solutions.

items.title: Uszatek Project
items.description: Launch of the Uszatek project, our most ambitious solar aircraft design to date.

items.title: Design Phase
items.description: Initial design and aerodynamic calculations for our solar-powered aircraft.

items.title: Solar Cell Integration
items.description: Development of innovative solar cell placement and power management systems.

items.title: Control Systems
items.description: Implementation of advanced flight control and navigation systems.

items.title: Testing Phase
items.description: Rigorous testing of all components and systems in various conditions.
